name: d1
description: 1. On your local computer, create a directory with your name inside the unit and day (`/uX/dX`) of the homework you want to submit. e.g. on my local `/GitHub/sei-39-homework/u1/d1/desmond_lim` 1. Create all your work in the directory created above. 1. Commit your changes frequently. 1. Push your changes to your remote github (your GA git) at least once a day.
